message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase our premium product for $12,500. This is a special offer tailored to your interest in the product, considering its value to you. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the discount, $12,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying at this point. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  This would be a fair deal for both of us, considering the value to me and the potential profit you could still make.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of that, I am willing to consider an offer closer to your suggested price. Therefore, I propose a price of $11,000 for the product. This still allows for a reasonable profit while acknowledging your valuation of the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
